p:
To identify differential splicing events regulated by RUNX1/RUNX1T1, we analyzed RNA-Seq data of the t(8;21)-positive AML cell line Kasumi-1 following RUNX1/RUNX1T1 knockdown (Supplementary Data 1, GSE54478). Knockdown was achieved by electroporation with the short interfering RNA (siRNA) siRR targeting the fusion site of the RUNX1/RUNX1T1 mRNA, while a mismatch siRNA, siMM, served as a control
28 (Fig. 1b).
